name: Onslaught of the Emu
description:
Made for the "Fam Jam" Game Jam.  (Theme: the second one, because you are fighting in the second Emu war) 

Feedback is much appreciated.

Controls:

Move - wasd

Shoot - Left click 

Switch Weapon - Q/E

It was a stormy night when the Emus came. They had devastated Australia for years after achieving consciousness however now they did the unbelievable. The whole world was suddenly and deliberately attacked. Only a breaking branch was heard when your fate was sealed by the Emus screech. The ravaging Emu Army took your home and burned your children. The only valid response is their total annihilation. The first step of this pursuit is taking an Emu fort. Kill the Emu Necromancer and free the world.

Credits:
